name: Messy Coder's Game Jam Entry
description:
demo video : https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1307048067

unzip and run the exe

prerequisites are in the Engine folder

Grab to grab

left stick to scoot

right stick to snap-turn

triggers to shoot

to holster a new gun simply hold it over the holster until the old one falls off :)

making this game was a nightmare :D
